Package com.meteordevelopments.duels.api.arena

Interface Arena

public interface Arena
Represents an Arena loaded on the server.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getName

      @NotNull String getName()
      The name of this arena. Will not contain a dash character ("-").
      Returns:
      Never-null String that is the name of this arena.

    • isDisabled

      boolean isDisabled()
      Whether or not this arena is currently disabled.
      Returns:
      True if this arena is disabled. False otherwise.
      See Also:
      • setDisabled(CommandSender, boolean)

    • setDisabled

      boolean setDisabled(@Nullable org.bukkit.command.CommandSender source, boolean disabled)
      Disables this arena which prevents it from being used in duels. Note: Calls ArenaStateChangeEvent.
      Parameters:
      source - CommandSender that will be the source of the ArenaStateChangeEvent called. May be null!
      disabled - True to disable the arena, False to enable.
      Returns:
      True if arena was disabled successfully. False if called ArenaStateChangeEvent was cancelled by a plugin.

    • setDisabled

      boolean setDisabled(boolean disabled)
      Calls setDisabled(CommandSender, boolean) with the source being null.
      Returns:
      True if arena was disabled successfully. False if called ArenaStateChangeEvent was cancelled by a plugin.
      See Also:
      • setDisabled(CommandSender, boolean)

    • getPosition

      @Nullable org.bukkit.Location getPosition(int pos)
      The spawnpoint set for the position number.
      Parameters:
      pos - Position number associated with the spawnpoint
      Returns:
      Location associated with the position number or null if position is unset.

    • setPosition

      boolean setPosition(@Nullable org.bukkit.entity.Player source, int pos, @NotNull org.bukkit.Location location)
      Sets a spawnpoint with the given position and location. Note: Calls ArenaSetPositionEvent.
      Parameters:
      source - Player that will be the source of the ArenaSetPositionEvent called. May be null!
      pos - Position number for the spawnpoint.
      location - Location to be the spawnpoint. Should not be null!
      Returns:
      True if the spawnpoint was set successfully. False if called ArenaSetPositionEvent was cancelled by a plugin.

    • setPosition

      boolean setPosition(int pos, @NotNull org.bukkit.Location location)
      Calls setPosition(Player, int, Location) with the source being null.
      Returns:
      True if the spawnpoint was set successfully. False if called ArenaSetPositionEvent was cancelled by a plugin.
      See Also:
      • setPosition(Player, int, Location)

    • isUsed

      boolean isUsed()
      Whether or not a duel is currently being played in this arena. If returned true, getMatch() is guaranteed to return a Match instance.
      Returns:
      True if this arena is in use. False otherwise.

    • getMatch

      @Nullable Match getMatch()
      The Match being played in this arena. May be null if no match is being played.
      Returns:
      Match instance if a duel is currently being played in this arena. null otherwise.

    • getOpponent

      @Nullable org.bukkit.entity.Player getOpponent(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      The Match opponent playing in this arena. May be null if no match is being played.
      Returns:
      Match instance if a duel is currently being played in this arena. null otherwise.

    • has

      boolean has(@NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Whether or not the player is playing in this arena.
      Parameters:
      player - Player to check if in this arena. Should not be null!
      Returns:
      True if the player is in this arena. False otherwise.

    • isRemoved

      boolean isRemoved()
      Whether or not this Arena has been removed.
      Returns:
      True if this Arena has been removed. False otherwise.
      Since:
      3.2.0
      See Also:
      • ArenaRemoveEvent
